title: Open Node Protocol
description: Open Node Protocol (ONP) is an open standard for creating modular, AI-ready solutions with interconnected nodes. Its AI-native design ensures seamless integration with LLMs, enabling features like function calling, prompt-to-node generation, and AI-assisted application assembly. Combined with ONP's inherently composable nature, this empowers faster development, easier collaboration, and seamless AI integration, enabling the next generation of digital innovation.
